PEOPLEActive.Name: Odysseas Papapetrou
PEOPLEActive.Description: Odysseas Papapetrou is an Associate Professor in the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science at TU/e, where he leads the Scalable Online Data Management (SOL-DM) group. His research focuses on streaming data management, large-scale datasets, and time-series analytics.
